Articles.Content:
Well hello there, here i will place all my craft and other stuff if you whant I can build crafts for you

Mods:Infernal robotics and BDarmory

Land

Otomatico:

It has a nice Armour and it is quite fast, althougth lacks heavy weaponry

Controls:Standar of what you would drive a car in ksp

Edited February 19, 2015 by elenir1

2 new crafts

Otomatico 2:

The nice armour of the Otomatico with a powerfull gun

Control:spin turret 1 and 2

Otomatico 3:

This time with rockets

Control:Spin turret 1 and 2

Cannon elevation 3 and 4

Patriot 2:

An AA that will make you scream every time you fire a rockets

Control:1 and 2 rise missiles

Nice craft you have here!

Have you ever thought about joining a company? If you like building military vehicles with BD armory you may want to come to KODI! Click the pic in my signature if youÃ‚Â´re interested!

Tired of getting your units killed by simple rockets

tired of the enemy tank that instantly kills you

well no more

o higgins:

Features

Double cape armour(1 exterior and 1 interior)

a cannon

Speed

Controls:Standar

Aircraft

Ku-22

Comes equiped with flares, not needed since its able to dodge most of missiles

Control:1 fire flare

Kenturion Tank

From Norway with love

Front:

A 32 tank based on the centurion once used by scandinavian nations, it has a ligth near the main cannon along with an AA gun on top of the turret

You can spin the turret with 1 and 2

Ligth ability

If you're making crafts and want to start a corp or join one check out the Rocket Builders sub-forum, where you can check out some corps you may want to join, or start your own (Elenir Industries, Elenir Military Tech, etc. etc.) it may be a good idea, because most people with multiple craft 'families' like you generally use a corp thread of their own. The Spacecraft Exchange is generally for showcasing a single 'family' of craft. You may also want to add craft downloads. Also on an unrelated side note, what mods does the O'Higgins use?
O higgins only has the bd armory mod, nothing else

O higgins only has the bd armory mod, nothing else

Ok, thanks.
